title: Crafting
content:
ell until Long Rest: Bear's Endurance, Bull's Strength, Cat's Grace, Eagle's Splendour, Fox's Cunning, and Owl's Wisdom. Despitre the rotting smell wafting off this talismanm, holding it makes you feel inexplicably powerful. TBA Butterflies in the Stomach Ingredients TBA Deals 1d6 piercing damage A traditional brew of ergot and nutmeg, meat to recapture the fluttering thrill of fist love. TBA

Salts of Mugwort Any Suspension

Duergar Antidote

Dropped by Gekh Coal at the beach in the Underdark.
